Changelog

September 1, 2021
Version 1.0.0 (26)
- Very first official release to the app stores! Hooray!
- New generators: At Sea Events, Desert Events, Town Events
August 20, 2021
Version 0.2.1 (26)
- New generators: Disease
August 6, 2021
Version 0.2.0 (26)
- New generators: Hideout, Magical weapons (common+), Bookstore
- Add more possibilities for adjectives, geolocations, NPC backgrounds, landmarks
- Clean up names
July 30, 2021
Version 0.2.0 (25)
- New generators: Heraldry, Magical jewelry, Magic armor (rare+)
- Generator updated: more complicated magical armor
- Add anonymous name
- Add sidebar to navigate to Favorites, About, TOU
- Breakout favorites to it's own page
- Ability to redo welcome survey
July 12, 2021
Version 0.2.0 (24)
- New generator: Magic armor (uncommon)
- Add report function
May 7, 2021
Version 0.2.0 (23)
- New generators: Building names, Bounties
- More books, and select by type
- Add session summary and donate telemetry
April 30, 2021
Version 0.2.0 (22)
- New generator: Rumours
- Add "split" option to coin conversion
- Add some more possible location descriptions
- Add a few more main course meals
- All food has a name, even if it's boring
